replies.body:
Hey Borra
How did you find Avicus? What made you stay? Opinions on Avicus right now and how it could become better?
Origins of your IGNs?
Do you like where you live?
Favourite planet of the Solar System?
Sword or bow? Are you a more offensive or more passive player?
Opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Borra
How did you find Avicus? What made you stay? Opinions on Avicus right now and how it could become better?

replies.body:
1) One of my friend was playing, then asked for the IP then loved it! I'm in love with maps, monuments and people there.
2) Umm, needs better staff and people should learn to be polite to each ones.
3) My name is Borra that's why xd Borra was taken then went with'Borrah'.
4) I'm lucky that it's the best city of Turkey, but I'm unlucky that I was born in US but I live here :p So much traffic and education is really bad here...
5) Mars :p Martian is an awesome movie that's why.
6) I enjoy using Sword but I also like Bow while defending.
7) You are a really nice guy that loves forums xd. You should be promoted to Mod I don't know if you applied but anyways. Most important player on Cacal I think. Your melee is fantastic. It's nice to talk to you on TS. :)

replies.body: Really nice guy that loves badges :) You should be promoted asap. I believe that Avicus needs mods like you that will improve this server a lot. Your pvp is pretty good. And you made an awesome team in a week with super OP players. Next tourney I hope your team plays :)
